channel.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
channel.description: Has anyone seen the premiere? It looks like it's modern but I've heard people talk about it being set in the Vietnam War or around that time period.

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182

Thats not its official name though. Any idiot can count.

Yes it is Frell, they already made their website Call of duty: Black Ops.
[/quote]
I was referring to the people saying that since its the 7th installment its cod 7: black ops.[/quote]
My playntrade had an epic deal where i bought modern warfare 1 and 2 plus World at War all together for 50$!

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

pl0x15:

hm u fucking idiot. Mw2 was call of duty number fucking 6. Thats why mofo. And blackops is fuckin call of duty number 7. So fuck you frell.

MW2 wasn’t released under the name “Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2” The actual name of it is just “Modern Warfare 2”. The only reason they put Call of Duty on the game case was because of idiots like you beating down their door.

@Topic:
Game looks fun. I will probably rent it so that I don’t make the mistake of buying an absolute shit game like MW2 then selling 5 months later. COD3 was made, and the series went to shit from there.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“riku9182, post:24, topic:340801”][quote author=riku9182 link=topic=437187.msg3214955#msg3214955 date=1274591037]
Fuck all of you- Straight from Wikipedia.com…

Call of Duty: Black Ops[5] is an upcoming 2010 first-person shooter video game[4] developed by Treyarch and published by Activision for release on November 9, 2010.[3] Officially announced on April 30, 2010, the game is the seventh installment of the Call of Duty series and the fourth game in the series to be developed by Treyarch after Call of Duty 2: Big Red One, Call of Duty 3 and Call of Duty: World at War. It was initially only available for pre-order on PC, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. Activision however confirmed that it will also be released on the Nintendo Wii.[2]

NUMBER 7!
[/quote]
It clearly says the seventh installment[/quote]
Thats not its official name though. Any idiot can count.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

The Soul:

Has anyone seen the premiere? It looks like it’s modern but I’ve heard people talk about it being set in the Vietnam War or around that time period.

Its both. Its all of the “other” wars that America has been through. Korean war, cold war, Vietnam, and a few others. Its over a 100 time span I believe.

Read full topic

Ps: its not the vietnam war, IIRC black ops is a special ops force. But the game does take place in vietnam and in south america.
